itemDescription: English cricketer and rugby union footballer (1909-1992)

wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Frank William Simpson DSO OBE ((1909-03-27)27 March 1909 – (1992-08-13)13 August 1992) was a British Army officer who also played cricket, including two first-class games, for various military teams between 1931 and 1954, also playing for the Straits Settlements in 1938 and 1939.

response: *Frank Simpson - played for the Army in 1931Frank Simpson at CricketArchive
